text: Álvaro López San Martín (; born 2 June 1997 in Barcelona) is a Spanish junior tennis player. López San Martín won the 2015 French Open boys' doubles championship, partnering Jaume Munar. López San Martín has a career high ATP singles ranking of 349 achieved on 30 January 2017. ==Junior Grand Slam finals: 1== ===Doubles: 1–0=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font- size:97% |- !Outcome !Year !width=150|Championship !Surface !width=150|Partner !width=150|Opponent !width=150|Score |-style="background:#ebc2af;" | style="background:#98fb98;"|Winner |2015 |French Open |Clay | Jaume Munar | William Blumberg Tommy Paul |6–4, 6–2 |} ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male tennis players Category:Tennis players from Barcelona Category:French Open junior champions Category:Grand Slam (tennis) champions in boys' doubles
title: Álvaro López San Martín
